page.title: 07New Barn Farm,Paulton.
page.content: { New Barn Farm}covers 45 acres.Grass is grown as feed for 45 beef cattle and heifers.The farmer kept dairy cattle until recently,when the over- production of milk in the E.E.C. led him to switch to beef production. The cattle are sold at markets at Winford or Chippenham. Work starts on the farm at 7.00 a.m. and finishes at 6.00 p.m.The farmer has been working on the farm all his life.He enjoys his work,even the muck_ spreading.The only thing he does not enjoy much is walking about in the rain.He often has to mend hedges and fences to stop the cows getting loose. He and his wife do all the work.They employ no_one else and have no holidays. The farmer owns a tractor and hay_ making machinery.
